data.title: Cavalier Art Supplies
data.text:
Viewbank College

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Our warehouse will be closed until 9am Monday January 8th.

Orders must be placed no later than Sunday 7th January 2024. Orders received after this date may not be available in time for the beginning of school.

Deliveries will commence mid January 2023 for orders placed before Sunday 7th January 2024.

Viewbank College

How to order

Order your art kits on this page.

1 – Fill in your contact details.*

2 – Select item(s) from a kit or kits by ticking the checkbox.**

3 – Submit and pay for your order via paypal, if you don’t have a paypal account you can still pay with a credit card. Details of your order will be emailed out to you.

School Requirements

*All orders to be posted to home address. No pick ups available.

**Items can be retained from previous year where applicable and only purchase again if needed.

Order form

Enter your details below:

Student Name/s:*

First Last

Need to order two kits for the one year level/subject?*

No

Yes

If you select yes, two kits for each year level/subject will be shown below.

Email:*

Contact number (mobile preferred):*

Address*

Street Address Town, suburb State Postcode

Click on kits below to view and select materials:

PayPal

Credit Card

Credit Card*

Card Details

Cardholder Name

CONTACT

Enquiries for Viewbank College Kits contact

03 5240 5555 (Press 1 at menu)

enquiries@cavalierart.com.au

Opening hours

8.30am 4.30pm

Monday to Friday

Please do not contact our art shop, they do not handle school kits.

THINGS TO KNOW

We provide Art Kits with items selected by art staff from your school. You may select all or some of the items.

Returns, Refund or Exchange Policy

Complete refund if posted back to Head Office with a copy of your receipt within 7 working days.

No exchanges, we simply refund your money if you send the kit back within 7 working days.

Warranty

Warranty on all items for 6 months for faulty items but not for mistreatment or stolen goods.

Delivery

Please check School requirements section.

Postage is $10.00

Pricing

Prices quoted are in Australian Dollars.

Prices inclusive of GST.
